title: Mexican Style Chicken Pie
ingredients: ['2 sheets ready-made shortcrust pastry', '55g grated Cheddar cheese', '225g skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into bite size pieces', "50g uncooked express rice, such as Uncle Ben's", '1 (410g) tin black beans, drained', '165g sweetcorn', '35g sliced black olives, drained', '250ml soured cream', '185g salsa', '165g grated Cheddar cheese', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste']
